name: 專題討論：科學與社會
comment: 學生需具備科學教育背景。
description: This course discusses the relations between science and societies and the evolution of the movement of scientific literacy in the second half of 20th century and the beginning of the 21st century. Firstly, a comparison of cultural differences between the Eastern and Western is focused and then followed by an exploration of the adaptation of Mandarin Chinese society as it encountered science. The phenomenon of ‘two cultures’ and the evolution of philosophy of science are addressed. Finally, the transition from the conception of scientific literacy to the ideas of science literate and multiliteracies is discussed.
goals: 瞭解科學的社會本質與科學-社會-文化的互動關係
瞭解科學素養的發展與內涵
對於各級科學教育的潛在問題進行哲學式的反思
能清晰明確的表達已有的論述、發展自我的論點，進而對自己之科學與社會相關主題的主張進行合適的論證。
